import React from 'react' import 'bulma/css/bulma.min.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router'; export default function SignUpForm(props) { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ username:'', password:'', name:'', quote:'' }) const handleChange = (event) => { setUserInfo({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const {username, password} = userInfo const userInfo = {username: username, password: password} fetch('/login', { method: 'POST', headers: {"Content-type":"application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify(userInfo) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(userInfo => {props.login(userInfo) setUserInfo({ username: '', password: '' }) }) } console.log(userInfo) return (

Sign Up









) }
